name: Angry Birds Breakfast 3
storyline:
Red, Chuck and Bomb where preparing breakfast but the carton of milk fell on the floor which made them distracted, while some Minion Pigs were stealing the box of cereal (by using a Wooden Cane). The birds later notice the cereal and the bowl were gone so they fling into action to get their breakfast back.

The Blues were enjoying their breakfast until they hear music behind a bush. When they went there, there was a Minion Pig playing the bagpipes, but that made them distracted so the other minion pigs were able to steal their cereal and their bowls. The blues notice after a while that the cereal and the bowl were gone so they fling into action to get their breakfast back.
